title: Court orders Trump's former attorney Giuliani to turn over luxury item and NY apartment in defamation case. See list of items
content: A US federal judge has ordered Rudy Giuliani to surrender his Manhattan apartment, a collectible Mercedes-Benz, and various valuable items to two Georgia election workers he defamed. The ruling follows a $148 million defamation judgment against him for falsely alleging election fraud in the 2020 Presidential elections.
summary: A US federal judge has ordered Rudy Giuliani to surrender his Manhattan apartment, a collectible Mercedes-Benz, and various valuable items to two Georgia election workers he defamed. The ruling follows a $148 million defamation judgment against him for falsely alleging election fraud in the 2020 Presidential elections.

title: 'Save democracy, give him the job': Jon Stewart on Donald Trump's McDonald's Visit
content: During a campaign stop at a Pennsylvania McDonald's, Jon Stewart criticizes Donald Trump, highlighting the absurdity of his publicity stunts. Stewart mocks Trump's attempt to work the fry counter and laments the media's misdirected outrage, while also poking fun at Trump's remarks about Arnold Palmer.
summary: During a campaign stop at a Pennsylvania McDonald's, Jon Stewart criticizes Donald Trump, highlighting the absurdity of his publicity stunts. Stewart mocks Trump's attempt to work the fry counter and laments the media's misdirected outrage, while also poking fun at Trump's remarks about Arnold Palmer.

title: Teenager arrested after allegedly killing five family members in Seattle suburb
content: A 15-year-old boy was detained in connection with the deaths of two adults and three minors in Fall City, near Seattle. The victims, who appear to be family members, succumbed to gunshot wounds. The suspect, held without significant resistance, will appear in court on Tuesday.
summary: A 15-year-old boy was detained in connection with the deaths of two adults and three minors in Fall City, near Seattle. The victims, who appear to be family members, succumbed to gunshot wounds. The suspect, held without significant resistance, will appear in court on Tuesday.

title: Australian woman wedged upside down between boulders for seven hours after trying to retrieve phone
content: A 23-year-old woman, Matilda Campbell, was rescued after getting trapped upside down in a narrow crevice between boulders in Australia's Hunter Valley. The operation took seven hours and required a multidisciplinary team effort. Campbell remained calm throughout and was freed with minor injuries. She later shared her experience humorously on social media.
summary: A 23-year-old woman, Matilda Campbell, was rescued after getting trapped upside down in a narrow crevice between boulders in Australia's Hunter Valley. The operation took seven hours and required a multidisciplinary team effort. Campbell remained calm throughout and was freed with minor injuries. She later shared her experience humorously on social media.

title: 'He was in favour of genocide': Protesters call for Bangladesh president's removal over remarks on Hasina
content: There are growing calls for President Mohammed Shahabuddin's resignation in Bangladesh following his controversial remarks on deposed Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina. Protests led by the Anti-discrimination Student Movement and other groups demand Shahabuddin step down and the dissolution of Hasina's Awami League party. Shahabuddin claims he has no documentary proof of Hasina's resignation.
summary: There are growing calls for President Mohammed Shahabuddin's resignation in Bangladesh following his controversial remarks on deposed Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina. Protests led by the Anti-discrimination Student Movement and other groups demand Shahabuddin step down and the dissolution of Hasina's Awami League party. Shahabuddin claims he has no documentary proof of Hasina's resignation.

title: RFK Jr defends fast food as part of 'American culture' following Trump's McDonald's shift
content: Robert F Kennedy Jr endorsed Donald Trump for the upcoming US presidential election, defending fast food as part of American culture despite his health initiative. He criticized the use of seed oils in fast food, advocating for a return to beef tallow to combat obesity, sparking mixed reactions.
summary: Robert F Kennedy Jr endorsed Donald Trump for the upcoming US presidential election, defending fast food as part of American culture despite his health initiative. He criticized the use of seed oils in fast food, advocating for a return to beef tallow to combat obesity, sparking mixed reactions.

title: Former Abercrombie CEO Michael Jeffries arrested over sex trafficking allegations
content: Former Abercrombie & Fitch CEO Michael Jeffries has been arrested on charges related to sex trafficking and interstate prostitution, following allegations from young individuals who claimed they were coerced into sexual acts. Jeffries and two others face these charges after extensive civil lawsuits and media reports.
summary: Former Abercrombie & Fitch CEO Michael Jeffries has been arrested on charges related to sex trafficking and interstate prostitution, following allegations from young individuals who claimed they were coerced into sexual acts. Jeffries and two others face these charges after extensive civil lawsuits and media reports.

title: Over 1,000 UK prisoners get early release to ease prison overcrowding
content: The UK was on Tuesday due to release early a second batch of 1,000 prisoners as the government launches a review of sentencing to ease chronic overcrowding in jails. Mahmood said the early release scheme had been forced on the government by a prison crisis inherited from the last Conservative government.
summary: The UK was on Tuesday due to release early a second batch of 1,000 prisoners as the government launches a review of sentencing to ease chronic overcrowding in jails. Mahmood said the early release scheme had been forced on the government by a prison crisis inherited from the last Conservative government.

title: ESA's Moonlight Program to create 400,000 km data network between Earth and Moon
content: The European Space Agency has launched the Moonlight Programme to establish Europe's first satellite constellation for lunar telecommunication and navigation. This initiative, involving the UK and Italy, aims to enable autonomous lunar operations and reduce costs, supporting over 400 planned lunar missions and fostering a lunar economy.
summary: The European Space Agency has launched the Moonlight Programme to establish Europe's first satellite constellation for lunar telecommunication and navigation. This initiative, involving the UK and Italy, aims to enable autonomous lunar operations and reduce costs, supporting over 400 planned lunar missions and fostering a lunar economy.

title: AI-generated video of Trump at McDonald's goes viral ahead of election
content: An AI-generated video of former President Donald Trump humorously tumbling out of a McDonald's drive-thru has become a viral sensation online. Trump's playful jab at Vice President Kamala Harris's claims of working at McDonald's in the 1980s has further fueled the debate.
summary: An AI-generated video of former President Donald Trump humorously tumbling out of a McDonald's drive-thru has become a viral sensation online. Trump's playful jab at Vice President Kamala Harris's claims of working at McDonald's in the 1980s has further fueled the debate.

title: 'Halloween Comet' set to light up sky in October—But will it survive sun?
content: The newly discovered comet C/2024 S1, possibly a remnant of the Great Comet of 1106, will reach its closest approach to Earth on October 24. Expected to brighten the skies around Halloween, it may be visible during daylight, particularly on October 28 if it remains intact.
summary: The newly discovered comet C/2024 S1, possibly a remnant of the Great Comet of 1106, will reach its closest approach to Earth on October 24. Expected to brighten the skies around Halloween, it may be visible during daylight, particularly on October 28 if it remains intact.

title: Shift among Jewish voters: More support for Trump?
content: As the 2024 election nears, some US Jewish voters in key states feel abandoned by the Democratic Party and may shift to Trump due to recent Hamas attacks. While most still support Democrats, the uncertainty and recent antisemitism may sway crucial votes, with both campaigns intensifying their outreach efforts.
summary: As the 2024 election nears, some US Jewish voters in key states feel abandoned by the Democratic Party and may shift to Trump due to recent Hamas attacks. While most still support Democrats, the uncertainty and recent antisemitism may sway crucial votes, with both campaigns intensifying their outreach efforts.

title: Undertaker hosts Trump on 'Six Feet Under', discuss realities of wrestling ring
content: Donald Trump appears on 'Six Feet Under' podcast with retired wrestling legend The Undertaker, showcasing his deep curiosity about professional wrestling's realities, physical toll, and behind-the-scenes tensions. Trump reflects on his WrestleMania involvement, acknowledging the scripted yet dangerous nature of pro wrestling.
summary: Donald Trump appears on 'Six Feet Under' podcast with retired wrestling legend The Undertaker, showcasing his deep curiosity about professional wrestling's realities, physical toll, and behind-the-scenes tensions. Trump reflects on his WrestleMania involvement, acknowledging the scripted yet dangerous nature of pro wrestling.

title: Trump under fire for dodging question on Republican 'Black Nazi' Mark Robinson
content: As campaigns heat up, Trump's endorsement of North Carolina gubernatorial candidate Mark Robinson has caused controversy after Robinson's past inflammatory comments were revealed. Trump deflected questions on the endorsement, contradicting his earlier praise of Robinson. The backlash on social media was swift, highlighting Trump's inconsistent stance and raising concerns about his awareness of local races.
summary: As campaigns heat up, Trump's endorsement of North Carolina gubernatorial candidate Mark Robinson has caused controversy after Robinson's past inflammatory comments were revealed. Trump deflected questions on the endorsement, contradicting his earlier praise of Robinson. The backlash on social media was swift, highlighting Trump's inconsistent stance and raising concerns about his awareness of local races.

title: Locker-room politics: What's behind Trump's lewd story about Arnold Palmer
content: Donald Trump intensifies vulgar language and hypermasculine rhetoric in the final weeks of the 2024 campaign, targeting male voters disillusioned by political correctness. This approach energizes his base but risks alienating suburban women and moderates, potentially widening the gender divide against Kamala Harris.
summary: Donald Trump intensifies vulgar language and hypermasculine rhetoric in the final weeks of the 2024 campaign, targeting male voters disillusioned by political correctness. This approach energizes his base but risks alienating suburban women and moderates, potentially widening the gender divide against Kamala Harris.

title: 'I hope you get PTSD': Twitch streamer Frogan banned after controversial remarks for US soldiers
content: Twitch streamer Frogan received a 30-day suspension following a viral clip where she made inflammatory comments about the US military, wishing PTSD on soldiers lacking remorse. She later clarified that her comments were misinterpreted. Despite issuing an apology, the incident led to widespread backlash and discussions about the responsibilities of public figures on platforms like Twitch.
summary: Twitch streamer Frogan received a 30-day suspension following a viral clip where she made inflammatory comments about the US military, wishing PTSD on soldiers lacking remorse. She later clarified that her comments were misinterpreted. Despite issuing an apology, the incident led to widespread backlash and discussions about the responsibilities of public figures on platforms like Twitch.

title: Trump inspects North Carolina post hurricane, criticises FEMA
content: Former President Donald Trump criticizes FEMA workers during a visit to North Carolina amid Hurricane Helene's impact. Trump renews unfounded claims about FEMA diverting resources, while state officials and the White House stress the importance of non-partisan recovery efforts and combating misinformation.
summary: Former President Donald Trump criticizes FEMA workers during a visit to North Carolina amid Hurricane Helene's impact. Trump renews unfounded claims about FEMA diverting resources, while state officials and the White House stress the importance of non-partisan recovery efforts and combating misinformation.

title: China holds live-fire drills opposite Taiwan, week after large-scale exercise
content: China is holding live-fire drills off Fujian province near Taiwan, following a large air-and-sea drill in response to Taiwan's rejection of Beijing's sovereignty claims. The Maritime Safety Administration warned ships to avoid the area. Taiwan is monitoring these drills, which come amid heightened tensions and increased Chinese military presence around the island.
summary: China is holding live-fire drills off Fujian province near Taiwan, following a large air-and-sea drill in response to Taiwan's rejection of Beijing's sovereignty claims. The Maritime Safety Administration warned ships to avoid the area. Taiwan is monitoring these drills, which come amid heightened tensions and increased Chinese military presence around the island.

title: Hurricane Oscar wreaks havoc in Cuba, causing severe power outages
content: Cuba is grappling with its worst power outage since 2022 after Hurricane Oscar caused extensive blackouts, leaving six dead and sparking protests. Families face hardship without electricity, while the government warns against unrest. Emergency measures are in place, but many doubt a swift recovery as the economy suffers and thousands flee abroad.
summary: Cuba is grappling with its worst power outage since 2022 after Hurricane Oscar caused extensive blackouts, leaving six dead and sparking protests. Families face hardship without electricity, while the government warns against unrest. Emergency measures are in place, but many doubt a swift recovery as the economy suffers and thousands flee abroad.

title: Trump urges Christians to vote, claims Harris will restrict religious freedoms
content: Donald Trump urged Christian voters to participate in the 2024 election, positioning himself as a defender of religious freedoms and calling the election a spiritual issue. He recounted an assassination attempt that strengthened his faith and promised action against gender ideology while highlighting his decision to relocate the US embassy in Israel.
summary: Donald Trump urged Christian voters to participate in the 2024 election, positioning himself as a defender of religious freedoms and calling the election a spiritual issue. He recounted an assassination attempt that strengthened his faith and promised action against gender ideology while highlighting his decision to relocate the US embassy in Israel.
